009
010package imagingbook.pub.dct;
011
012/**
013 * This class provides the functionality for calculating the DCT in 2D.
014 * TODO: use generic types?
015 * 
016 * @author W. Burger
017 * @version 2019-12-26
018 */
019public abstract class Dct2d {
020        
021        boolean useFastMode = true;
022        
023        public void useFastMode(boolean yesOrNo) {
024                this.useFastMode = yesOrNo;
025        }
026
027        private Dct2d() {
028        }
029        
030        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
031
032        public static class Float extends Dct2d {
033                
034                public Float() {
035                }
036
037                /**
038                 * Performs an "in-place" 2D DCT forward transformation on the supplied data.
039                 * The input signal is replaced by the associated DCT spectrum.
040                 * @param g the signal to be transformed (modified)
041                 */
042                public void forward(float[][] g) {
043                        transform(g, true);
044                }
045
046                /**
047                 * Performs an "in-place" 2D DCT inverse transformation on the supplied spectrum.
048                 * The input spectrum is replaced by the associated signal.
049                 * @param G the spectrum to be transformed (modified)
050                 */
051                public void inverse(float[][] G) {
052                        transform(G, false);
053                }
054
055                // in-place 2D DCT
056                private void transform(final float[][] data, boolean forward) {
057                        final int width = data.length;
058                        final int height = data[0].length;
059
060                        // do the rows:
061                        float[] row = new float[width];
062                        Dct1d.Float dct1R = 
063                                        useFastMode ? new Dct1dFast.Float(width) : new Dct1dDirect.Float(width);
064                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
065                                //IJ.showProgress(v, height);
066                                extractRow(data, v, row);
067                                if (forward)
068                                        dct1R.forward(row);
069                                else
070                                        dct1R.inverse(row);
071                                insertRow(data, v, row);
072                        }
073
074                        // do the columns:
075                        float[] col = new float[height];
076                        Dct1d.Float dct1C = 
077                                        useFastMode ? new Dct1dFast.Float(height) : new Dct1dDirect.Float(height);
078                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
079                                //IJ.showProgress(u, width);
080                                extractCol(data, u, col);
081                                if (forward)
082                                        dct1C.forward(col);
083                                else
084                                        dct1C.inverse(col);
085                                insertCol(data, u, col);
086                        }
087                }
088
089                private void extractRow(float[][] data, int v, float[] row) {
090                        final int width = data.length;
091                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
092                                row[u] = data[u][v];
093                        }
094                }
095
096                private void insertRow(float[][] data, int v, float[] row) {
097                        final int width = data.length;
098                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
099                                data[u][v] = (float) row[u];
100                        }
101                }
102
103                private void extractCol(float[][] data, int u, float[] column) {
104                        final int height = data[0].length;
105                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
106                                column[v] = data[u][v];
107                        }
108                }
109
110                private void insertCol(float[][] data, int u, float[] column) {
111                        final int height = data[0].length;
112                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
113                                data[u][v] = (float) column[v];
114                        }
115                }
116        }
117
118}
119
120
